question: This proclamation lifted Martial Law on January 17, 1981.
The Assassination of__________ catalyzed the middle class and economic elite to join the opposition against the Marcos Regime.
Groups such as _________ and ________ were formed due to the collapse and decline of the economy and the country.
Mass protests were held against the widespread human rights abuses, plunder and corruption of Marcos _________ and foreign capitalists.
A __________ was held on February 7, 1986, which sought to legitimize Marcos’ stay in power.
Following the exposure of the Reform the Armed Forces Movement of committing a coup d'etat, ___________ and _______ sought shelter inside Camp Aguinaldo and Camp Crame.
True or False. Enrile and Ramos recognized Cory Aquino as the winner of the Snap Election polls.
True or False. The People Power Revolution was contained only in the National Capital Region.
The Marcos Family __________ in/from Malacañang Palace as advised by the American Government.
This radio station played a vital role in the EDSA People Power Revolution.
